content:
370 "Shut the fuck up Dinesh [D'Souza]. Unprovoked, your response to my family and I being doxxed, threatened, and harassed by Indian nationalists infuriated by my documentation of a poop-throwing festival was NOT sympathy as a fellow American. Is America simply an economic exploitation zone?" posted 1 day ago by bleeje 31 comments award share report block Tyler Oliveira @tyleraloevera • 2d Shut the fuck up Dinesh. Unprovoked, your response to my family and I being doxxed, threatened, and harassed by Indian nationalists infuriated by my documentation of a poop-throwing festival was NOT sympathy as a fellow American. NOPE. You posted a screenshot of median Dinesh D'Souza @DineshDSouza • 3d I don’t think these losers understand how I react to this abuse. I react in the way the Duke of Kent would react to the caterwauling of a street heckler. I don’t seek a duel; I’m simply entertained by the stupidity. My wife tells me I enjoy these plebeian tantrums way too much.
31 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Around the Web 1 Simple Hack to Cut Your Electric Bill (Try Tonight) GadgetCyno newestofnew 47 points 1 day ago somehow the messaging of "our families sacrificed nothing for this country but have defrauded the system to commandeer its bounty for ourselves... and that makes us better Americans than you" isn't going to work out for these people the way they think it will permalink award report block reply bleeje OP 29 points 1 day ago What do you think of their 'we work harder than lazy Americans!!!!' propaganda? permalink parent award report block reply 0Sum 28 points 1 day ago Many of them work harder because they're living under the threat of work or we won't renew your H1B. This mentality encourages long hours of low quality results. I work in the tech industry and I can tell you from firsthand experience, many of the Indians are very hard to work with. They're stubborn, overconfident, and very often incorrect. They seem to look down on their peers and won't ask for help when needed for fear of being judged or found out. permalink parent award report block reply xBigCoffinHunter 14 points 1 day ago Exact same experience.  Friendly as hell, until they aren’t. usually right around the time someone figures out they’re full of shit.  It becomes clear that is an effort to keep you off their back. permalink parent award report block reply 0Sum 4 points 1 day ago I can't wait for AI to replace them all. Most engineering work comes down to analyzing data to determine what part to replace. They rarely have their hands on the actual equipment. They seem to rely on a spreadsheet and broken logic. permalink parent award report block reply TD_Covfefe_Crusader 7 points 1 day ago That was my experience working with them as well. I retired from a career in software development and I had to manage a few Indian teams and also work with Indian managers. Even my last boss was Indian, as they had pretty much taken over the field right around the time I retired. permalink parent award report block reply Standingoak 2 points 17 hours ago Perfect description of a Caste system.  Or sons and daughters of wealth in America. permalink parent award report block reply newestofnew 24 points 1 day ago everyone is an individual and work ethic is deeply personal characteristic. that said, in general, if that were true the whole world would be trying to get into India rather than out of it. permalink parent award report block reply patrioticwinning3 8 points 1 day ago Propaganda pushed by globohomo at the top! permalink parent award report block reply snoopy3210 -1 points 1 day ago Fuck Tyler is all I can say.
